H0.text: Which Wagner opera tells the story of the eponymous swan knight and features The Bridal Chorus. Parsifal

H3.text: Which Wagner opera tells the story of the eponymous swan knight and features The Bridal Chorus. Lorengel

A5.text: The Bridal Chorus, colloquially known in English-speaking countries as 'Here Comes the Bride', usually played as a processional at weddings, is part of Tristan und Isolde.

A6.text: The 'Bridal Chorus' (German: 'Treulich gef체hrt') from the 1850 opera Lohengrin by German composer Richard Wagner

A7.text: Treulich gef체hrt is found in Act III, scene 1 of Lohengrin.

A8.text: The opera is spelled Lohengrin, not Lorengel.

A9.text: The Bridal Chorus from Lohengrin is frequently played as the bride's processional wedding march in English-speaking countries.
